title: Monthly/yearly subscriber live game out of market - Game Tile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a Monthly/Yearly subscriber
AND a regular game is scheduled/in-progress
AND the user is not in the viewing market of the game
AND the game level entitledVideo equals true in MAST EPGv3
AND the game level blackedOutVideo equals false in MAST EPGv3
custom_steps: WHEN a user views/focuses a scheduled/in-progress game tile
custom_expected:
THEN a lock icon does not display in the upper right corner of the game tile
AND there is no dark overlay over the team colors in the game tile header
AND the team logos are displayed in the game tile header, away team then home team

title: Monthly/Yearly subscriber live game out of market - Feed Select
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a Monthly/Yearly subscriber
AND a regular game is scheduled/in-progress
AND the user is not in the viewing market of the game
AND the game level entitledVideo equals true in MAST EPGv3
AND the game level blackedOutVideo equals false in MAST EPGv3
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a scheduled/in-progress game tile
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see feed buttons for both teams
AND the user can playback feeds for both teams

title: Monthly/yearly subscriber live FGotD out of market - Game Tile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a Monthly/Yearly subscriber
AND a FGotD is scheduled/in-progress
AND the user is not in the viewing market of the FGotD
AND the game level entitledVideo equals true in MAST EPGv3
AND the game level blackedOutVideo equals false in MAST EPGv3
AND the feed level freeGame equals true in MAST EPGv3
custom_steps: WHEN a user views/focuses a scheduled/in-progress FGotD game tile
custom_expected:
THEN a lock icon does not display in the upper right corner of the game tile
AND there is no dark overlay over the team colors in the game tile header
AND a Free Game of the Day pill displays left justified at the bottom of the game tile
